childMarkdownRemark.html: I am a Front End Developer and Web Accessibility Advocate based out of Toronto, Canada who can be found on LinkedIn, Twitter, and Codepen

I'm currently working at Fable, a leading accessibility testing platform powered by people with disabilities. You can see some of my previous work at Digital Public Square, Declutter, and Diabetes Canada.

I'm passionate about creating inclusive user-focused web applications for purpose-driven organizations.

I spend a lot of time on the internet, playing videos games and reading, but would almost always rather be surrounded by trees. I care about social justice and the environment.

If you want to get in touch, send a message to hidanielle.dev [at] gmail.com or reach out on social media.
